description.p: Left-pads a string with the specified character(s) until it is the desired length.

prototypes.prototype: StringPadLeft as C (String as C, TotalLength as N [, PadString as C])

description.p: The maximum length of the new string.
Default = ' ' (a space). The character(s) to pad the string.

discussion.p: The StringPadLeft function prepends a string with one or more characters until it is the specified length.

example.caption: StringPadLeft() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 StringPadLeft(CompanyName,30,'-') AS Expr1 FROM Customers =-----------Alfreds Futterkiste
